title: Self-Directed Online Science Learning Strategies Using Mobile Devices

context.prior_knowledge: Basic usage of online learning platforms and understanding of foundational scientific concepts
context.additional_context: Work-integrated learning for professionals, smartphone-centric learning environment, project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can independently navigate science lecture materials (annotated PDFs, videos) using mobile devices
Learners can perform real-time academic communication (Q&A, feedback) with peers and instructors via mobile apps
Learners can propose three or more practical strategies to overcome technical constraints (small screens, input limitations, etc.) in mobile learning

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
